entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of thunderstorms. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 near noon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:57 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
